item.description:
Pulcinella Mozzarella Bar & Ristorante http://www.pulcinellamozzarellabar.com/ordereze/default.aspxÂ just opened in August. Owner Giovanni Oliva also has Trattoria Pulcinella in Cambridge. He is from Naples, which is where this regional cuisine derives from. Mozzarella is an imported specialty on the list of appetizers. The restaurant is sleek and modern. Prices are $9-18 for appetizers and $18-36 for entrees. It's located a short walk down the left side of Salem Street if you're coming from the Greenway.

The evening will begin with an opportunity to mingle with all the guests from 6:00-7:00 over a glass of wine or a beer. Please bring cash, as we won't be getting separate checks.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the bar until 7:00
item.name: Pulcinella Mozzarella Bar & Ristorante-Dinner
